titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the interest on certain obligations issued by an issuer who is in arrears with respect to another obligation issued by the issuer, or guaranteed by a guarantor who is in arrears with respect to another obligation guaranteed by the guarantor, is not exempt from tax.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/8/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the interest on certain governmental obligations issued by an issuer who is in arrears with respect to another obligation issued by the issuer, or guaranteed by a guarantor who is in arrears with respect to another obligation guaranteed by the guarantor, is not exempt from tax.
